metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18236 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Exempi before 2.4.4. TheASF_Support::ReadHeaderObject function inXMPFiles/source/FormatSupport/ASF_Support.cpp allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a crafted .asf file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18236` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exempi - 2.2.2-2ubuntu0.1
libexempi3 - 2.2.2-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exempi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.2-2ubuntu0.1').
